fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Swim Around**: Swim around a players house, causing them to visit one of there neighbors at random instead.
**Look For Water**: Look for water, giving the Minecraft(Head) role one Cod.
**Flail**: Flail Around, dealing a basic attack to the target. This attack cannot kill the target.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
**Water Dependent**; Every other ability you use must be Look For Water.
- If you die, the Minecraft(Head) role gains one Cod and one Bonemeal.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Slay all else and turn them into gear
